creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: four vertical panels of blue fabric with white pattern sewn together; pairs of white squares and crossed diamonds alternate in pattern throughout; strip of black Velcro (loop) along top edge on verso
markings: verso LL, Thomas Murray Collection label: JAP 6089
title: Dark blue-ground bedding cover (futonji) with pictorial ikat (e-gasuri) pattern made in the San'in Region
